The only downside to making it a singleton bean would be to lose the report=
 feature I added to it (allowing me to easily see the available space remai=
ning without SSHing into the box).

That started me thinking, why don't we =
add a bean-report that includes a report from every bean that implements a =
"Reportable" interface? That would enable any object that had usable data t=
o report to expose that data to the operator. This would also cover my scop=
e-report idea as the DecideRules are beans also.

Gordon, I'll contact you =
off-list about integrating the new LowDiskPause feature into H3.

- Kris
